name: Singed
title: the Mad Chemist
shortBio: Singed is a brilliant alchemist of dubious morality, whose experiments would turn the stomach of even the most cutthroat criminal. Selling his skills to the highest bidder, he cares little for how his noxious concoctions are used, with the ensuing chaos an experiment in itself. His most infamous work is “shimmer”, which enabled the chembarons to turn Zaun into their personal playground—but fueled by madness, Singed is always working on something new, with each endeavor more depraved than the last...

skins.name: Riot Squad Singed
skins.description: A limited Riot Games skin given away at 2010 and 2011 events.

skins.name: Hextech Singed
skins.description: Zaun's early forays into Hextech were critical to the movement, but not all were met with success. The scientist known as Singed warped his mind and body as he looped noxious, magically-infused chemical byproducts into his veins, twisting himself into a monster.

skins.name: Surfer Singed
skins.description: Sure, the haircut is dated, and the off-brand sunscreen is a little dodgy, but Singed held out on the Tiki mug—and look what came roaring back into fashion! The man is a visionary.

skins.name: Mad Scientist Singed
skins.description: Everyone thinks Singed is crazy. In reality, he's just a normal scientist with a penchant for bright neon colors.

skins.name: Augmented Singed
skins.description: A dastardly villain lurking in the dark corners of New Valoran, the mild-mannered Dr. Peter Singed was transformed by a volatile chemical of his own invention—becoming the superhuman criminal known only as… Singed! Can anyone stop this vile malefactor before it's too late?!

skins.name: Snow Day Singed
skins.description: Even deranged chemists need a day off, and Singed is no exception. Riding into battle with his recently sharpened sled and (patent pending) Portablizzard backpack, he is ready to dominate the snowball game, one crushing victory at a time.

skins.name: SSW Singed
skins.description: Honoring Looper's winning performance as Singed during the 2014 World Championship.

skins.name: Black Scourge Singed
skins.description: The doctor Singed induced many dreams with his mastery of science, and in these dreams the queen would gaze across the whole of creation, unraveling its secrets. But the shadow soon found her, and as she so hungered for its power, Singed turned to the craven arts to speed her corruption.

skins.name: Beekeeper Singed
skins.description: At first Singed wasn't certain he wanted to be a master beekeeper. But the moment he put on the protective suit, he knew it was destiny. Nowadays he can be found tending his hives, eating honey, or flipping any hapless wanderers that stop to gaze upon his work.

skins.name: Resistance Singed

chromas.name: Resistance Singed (Ruby)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

skins.description: Though many in the Resistance find Singed unsettling, few can deny his efficacy in pushing back the machine threat. For Singed, the only thing that matters is driving back Viktor's creations, whatever the means.

skins.name: Astronaut Singed

chromas.name: Astronaut Singed (Ruby)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

skins.description: No space adventure would be complete without a navigator. When Singed isn't creating special concoctions to keep his team safe, he's steering the crew's ship through the galaxy, masterfully guiding them to wherever his captain's whimsical orders lead them (and collecting any adorable meeps along the way).

skins.name: Arcane Shimmer Lab Singed
skins.description: Singed's experiments spit in the face of scientific ethics, each unleashing a new terror onto Zaun. But there is a method to Singed's madness. To make strides in the field of science, one must be willing to do whatever it takes, no matter the cost—and he is happy to pay the price.

passive.name: Noxious Slipstream
passive.description: Singed drafts off nearby champions, gaining a burst of Move Speed when passing them.

spells.name: Poison Trail
spells.description: Leaves a trail of poison behind Singed, dealing damage to enemies caught in the path.
spells.dynamicDescription: <toggle>Toggle:</toggle> Singed lays a poisonous trail that deals <magicDamage>@DamagePerSecond@ magic damage</magicDamage> per second.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Mega Adhesive
spells.description: Throws a vial of mega adhesive on the ground, slowing and grounding enemies who walk on it.
spells.dynamicDescription: Singed hurls a cask of sticky liquid, <status>Grounding</status> and <status>Slowing</status> enemies in the area by @SlowPercent@% for @WDuration@ seconds.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Fling
spells.description: Damages target enemy unit and flings them into the air behind Singed. If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Singed flings an enemy over his shoulder, dealing @BaseDamage@ plus @Effect3Amount@% max Health magic damage.

If Singed flings a target into his Mega Adhesive, they are Rooted for @Effect2Amount@ seconds.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Insanity Potion
spells.description: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him increased combat stats, and making his Poison Trail apply Grievous Wounds.
spells.dynamicDescription: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him @StatAmount@ <scaleAP>Ability Power</scaleAP>, <scaleArmor>Armor</scaleArmor>, <scaleMR>Magic Resist</scaleMR>, <speed>Move Speed</speed>, <healing>Health Regen</healing>, and <scaleMana>Mana Regen</scaleMana> for @Duration@ seconds. During this effect, Singed's <spellName>Poison Trail</spellName> also applies @GrievousAmount*100@% Grievous Wounds for @GrievousDuration@ second.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
